You're looking at the new lore. However, her old lore alludes to her being a seductress. Take a look, second-to-last sentence of the second paragraph from her old lore. 

> *"Evelynn now **curries favor from League summoners,** gaining influence for reasons known only to her."*

It doesn't say specifically HOW she "curries favor," but considering her sexual character design, I think we can safely assume her sexual appeal plays some role in her interaction with summoners. I'm not justifying the sexual design trend Riot has going with most female champions, but Evelynn's looks have some basis to them.
